## Description {#details}

This pass is responsible for selecting generic machine instructions to target-specific instructions.

It relies on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructionselector">InstructionSelector</a> provided by the target. Selection is done by examining blocks in post-order, and instructions in reverse order.


<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
for all inst in MF: not isPreISelGenericOpcode(inst.opcode)
</SectionUser>

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/instructionselect-h">InstructionSelect.h</a>.
